definitions.definition: To strike something sharply with one's knuckles; knock.
To strike with a quick blow; to knock on.
To free (a pattern) in a mould by light blows on the pattern, so as to facilitate its removal.
To speak (lyrics) in the style of rap music.
definitions.example: He rapped a song to his girlfriend.

definitions.definition: To talk casually; to engage in conversation.
To transport out of oneself; to affect with rapture.
The sound of a rap or knock.
definitions.example: During the séance, we heard mysterious rappings on the table.

definitions.definition: Musical speech accompanied by a rhythm, most commonly as part of hip-hop music.
